definition: to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
to plead (not guilty)/to enter a plea

sentences.english: The court recorded a plea of not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 法院对无罪抗辩作了记载。

sentences.english: Parts for public use and functional segments are the pleas of industri…
sentences.chinese: 公用性和功能性内容是外观设计专利侵权的抗辩事由。

sentences.english: Second, comparing the principle of the prior art and other correlative principles.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是公知技术抗辩原则与其他相关原则的比较。

sentences.english: Arraignment is when the charges against the juvenile will be read, and the judge will ask how the juvenile pleads.
sentences.chinese: 提审会宣读对其的指控，法官会要求他自己进行抗辩。

sentences.english: He plead that he have act in self-defence when he have hit the mugger .
sentences.chinese: 他抗辩道，当他打击行凶抢劫者时他是在自卫。

sentences.english: She put in a plea of guilty.
There's little point in remonstrating with John.
sentences.chinese: 跟约翰抗辩没有什么意义，他不听劝。

sentences.english: Chapter three, perfect news tort defense system of our country.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，我国新闻侵权抗辩事由制度的完善。

sentences.english: The arbitrator's decision on the delay in raising the plea, will, however, be subject to judicial control.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁员对不按时提出抗辩的裁决，须受司法监督。

sentences.english: The rule of Estoppel is important on the Anglo - American insurance law.
sentences.chinese: 禁止抗辩原则是保险合同法的一条重要原则。

sentences.english: The new Chinese contract law establishes the counter plea system.
sentences.chinese: 新的《合同法》确立了抗辩权制度。

sentences.english: Wilson is charged with petit theft and resisting recovery of property.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士以小偷小盗和持续取回财产的抗辩而被控诉。

sentences.english: This part also introduces the debtor's right of defense and right of offset.
sentences.chinese: 同时，该部分对债务人之抗辩权和抵销权也作了介绍。

sentences.english: Chapter two, study on news tort defense in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，新闻侵权抗辩事由之国外比较研究。

sentences.english: The system of the unpeaceful plea is a traditional system of Civil Law .
sentences.chinese: 不安抗辩权制度是大陆法系中一个传统的制度。

sentences.english: There's little point in remonstrating with John. He won't listen to reason.
sentences.chinese: 跟约翰抗辩没有什么意义，他不听劝。

definition: to defend oneself/to rebut a charge
to explain/to justify/to defend (a point of view etc)/to provide an explanation/to try to defend oneself
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to speak in defense of/to argue in favor of/to defend/to plead
examination of the evidence of the opposing party in a court of law
another case (in law)/a case to treat separately
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
